mapper.select: SELECT D.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , D.DAY_ATTD_CODE , TO_CHAR(D.APPLY_DAY, 'YYYY/MM/DD') APPLY_DAY , D.ATTD_TYPE_CODE , D.ATTD_TYPE_NAME , D.TIME FROM DAY_ATTD D , EMP E WHERE D.EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND D.APPLY_DAY = TO_DATE(#{applyDay}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE ORDER BY D.TIME

SELECT E.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NAME , D2.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_NAME , D1.ATTEND_TIME AS ATTEND_TIME , D1.LEAVE_TIME AS LEAVE_TIME , D1.BRIEF_LEAVE_TIME AS BRIEF_LEAVE_TIME , D1.WORK_HOUR AS WORK_HOUR , D1.LATENESS_STATUS AS LATENESS_STATUS , D1.OVER_WORK_HOUR AS OVER_WORK_HOUR , D1.NIGHT_WORK_HOUR AS NIGHT_WORK_HOUR , D1.FINALIZE_STATUS AS FINALIZE_STATUS , D1.EARLY_LEAVE_TIME AS EARLY_LEAVE_TIME FROM DAY_ATTD D1, DEPT D2, EMP E WHERE D1.DEPT_CODE = D2.DEPT_CODE AND D1.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE AND D1.DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} AND D1.REF_DAY BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
mapper.update: UPDATE DAY_ATTD SET FINALIZE_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE EMP_CODE = ( SELECT EMP_CODE FROM EMP WHERE EMP_NAME = #{empName} ) AND DEPT_CODE = ( SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_NAME = #{deptName} )
